original_title: スカイエンジェル ブルー Vol.22 小澤マリア
overview: Popular Sky Angel starring Ozawa Maria starring in Blu – ray Disc enjoying super high image quality! Half beautiful woman with Canadian father and Japanese mother. Special skill is guitar & English conversation. My hobby is shopping. She is a fashionable young lady who attends an international school from elementary school first grade to high school student and comes from Graho division. She is also known for his eagerness to study and his consideration for his appearing work is considerable. I did a lot of research, posing, facial expressions, nails and so on, I produced enough for my own production, fan service was quite good!
title: SKYHD-022 SkyAngel Blue Vol.22: Maria Ozawa
